Module.Name: PBK models
Module.Description: PBK models relate exposures or hazard characterisations from one or more external routes (dietary, non-dietary oral, dermal, inhalation) to an internal (target) compartment. Kinetic models can be simple absorption factors or differential-equation based PBK models. MCRA currently includes the EuroMix generic PBK model and the bisphenol model of ETHZ. Parameters for instances of PBK models can be specified as data.
Module.ShortDescription: PBK models convert exposures or hazard characterisations from one or more external routes or compartments to an internal (target) compartment using physiological based kinetic models.
Module.DataDescription: Specify nondietary absorption factors as data.
